name: @__e2e__verdacio/hmr-parcel
description: An Aurelia 2 client application with Parcel bundler.

scripts.test:e2e: cross-env APP_PORT=9009 concurrently "npm run dev" "playwright test" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:e2e:watch: cross-env APP_PORT=9009 concurrently "npm run dev" "playwright-watch test"
scripts.test:e2e:debugger: cross-env APP_PORT=9009 PWDEBUG=1 concurrently "npm run dev" "playwright-watch test"
scripts.test: concurrently 'npm run build' 'npx http-server dist --silent -p 8081' 'npx playwright test' --kill-others --success command-2
